title: App crashes when click on any option of dependencies.
body:
#### Expected behaviour We should be able to perform the functions properly as the app is supposed to. #### Actual behavior App crashes when we click on any log then on any option among dependencies ,the app crashes. #### How to reproduce Download app from f-droid.org Install app launch the app. App keeps on loading for some time Click on any option in dependencies. It crashes. * Browser: Crates.io unofficial * Version:1.4.2 * Operating system:5.1.1 #### Recording Of The Bug https://youtu.be/5v-6o6e-xaU
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: App crashes when i tried to open subscribed log in crates. io unofficial.
body:
#### Expected behavior After subscribing the data by clicking on bell option, want to open that data in subscribed option, it must be able to open. #### Actual behavior When i open the app and goes to subscribed option to see the subscribed blogs. After pressing on it to open. It crashes. #### How to reproduce Install the app from f droid Open it After loading the data open any of them Press on bell option to subscribe . Go to options sections by sliding left to right Here is Subscribed option. Press on it to open, then their appears some blogs. Click on it to reproduce the bug. * Browser: Crates.io unofficial * Version:1.4.2 * Operating system:5.1.1 #### Recording Of The Bug https://youtu.be/denwgySc0I4
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: 1.4.2 Not on F-Droid
body: Thanks for the app! Unfortunately it seems fdroid was skipped with the last version. could you look into it?
